body_html: Definitely tensor.new(shape).zero_(). The other one won't preserve the device (as I explained before), and if tensor is GPU, then the second solution will do the zero-filling on the CPU, which is slower.
body_text: Definitely tensor.new(shape).zero_(). The other one won't preserve the device (as I explained before), and if tensor is GPU, then the second solution will do the zero-filling on the CPU, which is slower.
body: Definitely `tensor.new(shape).zero_()`. The other one won't preserve the device (as I explained before), and if `tensor` is GPU, then the second solution will do the zero-filling on the CPU, which is slower.
